Description: Ovoid ceramic jar with direct rim, collared upper neck, elongated neck, and ovoid body. Covered in thick cream slip and decorated in red paint depicting representations of three giraffes, trees, and a human figure.
Curator's comments: Published: T. Phillips [ed.], Africa, London 1995, p. 111 [1.83] = T. Phillips [ed.], Afrika, Berlin 1996, p.111 [1.83].
